description.en:
Volume 1 (2012/6/25)
#Cover illustration: Aniya Yuiji

1. Toyed. by Aniya Yuiji
2. Love or Kick! by Mineshima Nawako
3. Jyoukyou Monogatari (ジョーキョー物語) by Nimoda Ai
4. Boku wa Anata ni Koi wo Suru (僕はあなたに恋をする) by Ichikawa Kei
5. Red Hot Sweet by Yamane Musashi
6. Ohirusagari no Hana no Kimi (御昼下がりの華の君) by SANKAKUSHA Pie
7. Koosuke-san, Zenra de Taiki! no Maki (コースケさん、全裸de待機!の巻) by Yamawomi
8. Sono Uso wa Kuchihodo ni Shinijitsu wo (その嘘は口ほどに真実を) by Yuki Ringo
9. Aotenjou no Killing Joke (青天井のキリング・ジョーク) by ISONO Funa
10. Kimishigure (キミシグレ) by Jaryuu Dokuro
11. Chronic (クロニック) by Kashio


Volume 2: "Erotoro R18" (エロとろ R18; 2013/6/28)
#Cover illustration: Aniya Yuiji

1. Sweet♡Sweat♡Monkey by Aniya Yuiji
2. Saigo no Hito (最後のひと) by Psyche Delico
3. Saiminjutsu Nyuumon (催眠術入門) by Kashio
4. Kaze no Sukima (風の隙間) by Ichikawa Kei
5. Three Piece! by Nimoda Ai
6. Ore, Higaisha (おれ、被喜者) by Kimura Hidesato
7. Oh My Chubby,baby! by Mineshima Nawako
8. Tenshiban no Ue (展翅板の上) by SATO Nishi
9. Sickly by Yamane Musashi
10. Help? by Yashiko
11. Henai (変愛) by Harada


Volume 3: "Erotoro R18 ver.SS" (エロとろ R18 ver.SS; 2014/8/9)
#Cover illustration: Aniya Yuiji

1. Fuuzokugurui deshita ga Toshishita Gakusei no Koibito ga Dekimashita (風俗狂いでしたが年下学生の恋人ができました) by Psyche Delico
2. Nurui Otoko (ヌルイ男) by Aniya Yuiji
3. 7-ji 32-pun 7-ryoume no Kimi (七時三十二分七両目の君) by Kashio
4. Henai: Maotokohen (変愛 間男変) by Harada
5. Kairaku Loop (快楽ループ) by YAMANE Musashi
6. S dakara tte Namenna yo! (Sだからってなめんなよ!) by Nimoda Ai
7. Koroshiya no Takaragai (殺し屋の宝貝) by NATORI Isato
8. Koi to wa Kinaru Mono (恋とは奇なるもの) by Mineshima Nawako
9. Kajima-kun no Shiranai Nichijou (鹿島くんの知らない日常) by Kimura Hidesato
10. Live by YASHIKI Eigo
11. Namae sae Iwanai (名前さえ言わない) byOKADA Kou
12. Furueru Mune no. (ふるえるむねの。) by COCONOE Ricoco
13. 24-jikan Ireppanashi Practice (24時間挿れっぱなしプラクティス) Purugaria
14. Ikujinashi no Spectator (いくじなしのスペクテイター) by YAMAMOTO Ataru
15. Kanojo nano ni Otoko (彼女なのに男) by Inutoki & Syohei
16. Kiyoku Tadashiku Kashikou Renai! (清く正しく賢く恋愛!) by Yashiko


Volume 4: "Erotoro R18: Hatsukoi" (エロとろ R18 ～初恋～; 2015/6/10)
#Cover illustration: Aniya Yuiji

1. Abenobashi hai ro no Jinrui (あべの橋、灰色の人類) (The Gray Humanity of Abenobashi) by Kimura Hidesato
Story of a guy doing lil yakuza jobs and his chance meeting with a guy named Megumi.
2. Tonari ni Sunderu Neko no Koto (隣に住んでる猫のこと) by Psyche Delico
3. Ezaki Shounen no Yuuutsu (江崎少年の憂鬱) by Kashio
4. First Love? wo Mouichido (ファーストラブ?をもう一度) by Yamawomi
5. 0-ten Manten (0点満点) by Emao
6. Sen wo Kaku (線を書く) by SAKAMOTO Aki
7. Boku wa Ninkimono (ボクは人気者) by Inutoki & Syohei
Prequel to a story in Ringo, Ki kara Ochiru
8. Koi ni Ochite Gomennasai (恋におちてごめんなさい) (Sorry for Falling in Love) by Aniya Yuiji
9. Afureru Moreru (あふれる漏れる) by Yashiko
10. Chigireta Te no Naka (ちぎれたてのなか) by COCONOE Ricoco
11. Suimenka (スイメンカ) by Harada
